message.content:
cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.SY

This paper deals with the problem of decentralized multi-agent reinforcement learning, which involves multiple robots learning to perform a task under decentralized control. This topic is closely related to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), robotics (cs.RO), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), multi-agent systems (cs.MA), and control systems (cs.SY). Given the focus on learning decentralized policies using a centralized Q-net, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG, followed by cs.RO and cs.AI. The use of multiple agents and the emphasis on decentralized control also make cs.MA a likely sub-category, while the control aspect of the problem could also place it in cs.SY.
